welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kadoma, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossom trees and rich history, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required, but users must agree to terms and conditions to connect.
